full_summary:
### Canada Revenue Agency Seeks Human Resource Consultant to Support Pay Equity

**Notice Number:** cb-205-3058255
**Publication Date:** 2023-08-31
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-05T14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

** contracting Entity:**
	
	Canada Revenue Agency (CRA)
	320 Queen Street, 10th floor, Place de Ville, Tower A 
	Ottawa, ON K1A 0L5

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA), Human Resource Branch, seeks a Senior Human Resource Consultant to support the planning, design, and implementation of the new federal Pay Equity Act. 

**Services and Deliverables:**

	* Analytical expertise on job evaluation methodology/tool
	* Assistance and support with the planning, design, and implementation of the new federal Pay Equity Act

**Contract Period and Extension Options:**

	* Contract duration: November 2023 to November 2024 (12 months)
	* One irrevocable option to extend the contract for an additional 12 months

**Security Requirements:**

	* Non-required

**Trade Agreements:**

	* Comprehensive Economic Trade Agreement (CETA)
	* World Trade Organizations – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO – AGP)
	* Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Associated Documents:**

	* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly to qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders

**Estimated Level of Effort:**

	* Contract period: 2850 hours
	* Option period: No additional level of effort

**Contact Information:**

Furqana Mehkari
Phone: (613) 219-6096
Email: Furqana.Mehkari@cra-arc.gc.ca

**Eligibility:**

	* This requirement is open to Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under “Tier 1” (=$0 - $3.75M) for the Human Resource Management Stream and Category 1.1 Human Resource Consultant (Senior) 

**Evaluation Criteria:**

	* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Closing Date:**

2023-10-05T14:00:00
